4304000.name: KharkivVision 2035 Demo
4304000.description:
KharkivVision-2035 is an atmospheric open-world narrative game that tells the story of Mark, a young man striving to find his place in a big city, but facing unexpected and difficult challenges.

What’s available in this demo version:

This free demo allows you to experience the atmosphere and get acquainted with the main character. The demo covers the very first moments of the story:

  • Trip to Kharkiv: A scene showing Mark’s journey from Bohodukhiv to Kharkiv by bus.

  • New home: Settling into a new apartment and the hero’s inner monologues about the move.

  • First walk: An opportunity to explore a small city park.

Gameplay and features:

The demo includes the core mechanics of the full game:

  • Environmental exploration: You can interact with objects in the apartment and walk through the park, immersing yourself in the details of the game world.

  • Narrative and atmosphere: Gameplay focuses on storytelling through cutscenes, dialogues, and Mark’s inner monologues.

  • Visual style: Experience hand-crafted locations of Kharkiv recreated using the Unreal Engine.
